algorithmwas proposed over two decades ago
]. It refers to the combination of multiple ‘weak classifiers’ into a single ‘strong classifier’. A
‘weak classifier’ is a classifier that performs slightly better than randomguessing. Random
guessing is equivalent to a 50%accuracy on a binary classification task.
